1.caption: 2022 NHL All-Star Game
1.description: The 2022 National Hockey League All-Star Game is an upcoming all-star game in the National Hockey League, scheduled to be held at T-Mobile Arena in Paradise, Nevada, the home of the Vegas Golden Knights. It will be played on February 5, pending the league's agreement with the International Olympic Committee to send NHL players to the 2022 Beijing Olympics.

2.caption: 2022 NHL Winter Classic
2.description: The 2022 NHL Winter Classic is an upcoming outdoor regular season National Hockey League (NHL) game, part of the Winter Classic series. It is scheduled for January 1, 2022 at Target Field in Minneapolis, Minnesota between the St. Louis Blues and the Minnesota Wild. The game was originally scheduled for 2021 but was postponed a year due to the COVID-19 pandemic.
